channel.title: How do you get a [[508]] server to run?
channel.description:
How do u get a 508 server to run when i go to run it says somthing like... The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
How do i get it to not do that? Well..... it does that for every single command prompt that i run for the 508 how do i get it to not say The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . . Please help me!

item.title: How do you get a [[508]] server to run?

item.title: How do you get a [[508]] server to run?
item.dc:creator: @Xizl_Halton_Xizl Xizl_Halton_Xizl
item.description:
@Xizl_Halton_Xizl wrote:

^^^^^^
what he said -.- i did code wrong x]

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_17\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause
change the Jdk1.5.0_17 to the java you have

item.title: How do you get a [[508]] server to run?
item.dc:creator: @Xizl_Halton_Xizl Xizl_Halton_Xizl
item.description:
@Xizl_Halton_Xizl wrote:

you need to go onto start > run > type in: C:\Program files\Java\ > check what java you have > then change this to it [code]@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\[b]jdk1.5.0_17[/b]\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause
change the bit thats bold to your version of java

pause[/code]

Read full topic
